original_text: True instruction was in his mouth, and no wrong was found on his lips. He walked with me in peace and uprightness, and he turned many from iniquity.
korean_text: 그의 입에는 진리의 법이 있었고 그의 입술에는 불의함이 없었으며 그가 화평함과 정직함으로 나와 동행하며 많은 사람을 돌이켜 죄악에서 떠나게 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: True instruction was in his mouth
and no wrong was found on his lips.
He walked with me in peace and uprightness
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 나와 함께 화평과 정직함으로 행했고

sentences.original_text: and he turned many from iniquity.
